Returns the Application enum value from the string
A string such as "logitravel", "traveltoolpt", "marcaviajes", etc. The Application enum value
See also Constants

member.name: M:Toolfactory.Core.BaseTypes.GeoPosition.Distance(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,Toolfactory.Core.BaseTypes.DistanceUnits)
member.summary:
This routine calculates the distance between two points (given the latitude/longitude of those points). It is being used to calculate the distance between two locations using GeoDataSource (TM) products.
Definitions: South latitudes are negative, east longitudes are positive
member.param: the unit you desire for results. DistanceUnits
member.remarks:
Worldwide cities and other features databases with latitude longitude are available at http://www.geodatasource.com
GeoDataSource.com (C) All Rights Reserved 2013

member.name: M:Toolfactory.Core.BaseTypes.GeoPosition.Distance(Toolfactory.Core.BaseTypes.GeoPosition,Toolfactory.Core.BaseTypes.GeoPosition,Toolfactory.Core.BaseTypes.DistanceUnits)
member.summary: This routine calculates the distance between two points.
